text: The Netcare System is part of the Digital India campaign introduced by Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi. The program is designed to allow access to modern software technology by those in rural areas, villages, and other remote parts of India. A major focus is enabling poor and rural students to use the Internet and related computer tech and information technology. Category:Internet in India Category:Ministry of Communications and Information Technology (India) Category:Modi administration initiatives Category:Rural development in India Category:Digital divide Category:Digital India initiatives
title: Netcare System
